entry.title: What I wasn't expecting
entry.summary:
When our first child was born, I received some excellent tactical advice in the hospital, viz:

  1. Sleep when they sleep.
  2. Never walk empty handed from one room to another.
  3. Something else, which I have forgotten.

In addition to these gems, I feel I can offer some more strategic advice. This is an incomplete list of what I wasn't expecting when we were expecting:

  1. You're not gonna remember this.
  2. Kill your identity. http://www.paulgraham.com/identity.html identity
